code: import React from"react";import{Line}from"react-chartjs-2";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const GraphBlock=_ref=>{let{data}=_ref;const labels=Array.from({length:data.length},(_,i)=>"Row ".concat(i+1));const datasets=Array.from({length:52},(_,colIndex)=>({label:"Amplitude ".concat(colIndex+1),data:data.map(row=>parseFloat(row[colIndex])),borderColor:"rgba(".concat(colIndex*5%255,", ").concat(colIndex*10%255,", ").concat(colIndex*15%255,", 0.8)"),fill:false}));const chartData={labels,datasets};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"graph-block",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Amplitude Graph"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Line,{data:chartData})]});};export default GraphBlock;
